title: simmonson
author: simmonson
created_time: August 25, 2022, 10:18:16 PMLast edit: February 10, 2023, 03:44:08 AM by simmonson
content: We present the new Crypto CoinFlip P2P Game Script with which you can create a cryptocurrency game site in P2P mode. With this product we assure you a revolutionary success in the Cryptocurrency gaming industry, get ready to offer a real gaming experience to your users.https://bitcoinsoftwares.online/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/crypto-coinflip-p2p-game-script-0-1536x957.pngMain Features-Responsive Design ready for any device (Desktop, Tablet or Smartphone).-Friendly URLs.-Well Documentated.-Automatic Install Wizard.-Google 2FA Included.-Google reCaptcha Included.-Dashboard Notifications.-Email Notifications.-Users Management (Registration, Login, 2FA Login, Password Recover, Email Verification).-Wallet Management (Send, Receive).-Person-to-person gaming experience.-Coinflip game.-Transactions History.-Support Tickets Management.-Account Settings-Profile Information.-Password Management.-Notifications Management.-Security Management.-Preferences.Requirements-Shared Hosting or VPS.-Hosting Control Panel (cPanel, VestaCP, Plesk and etc).-1 GB RAM (Recommended).-5 GB SDD DISK SPACE (Recommended).-Apache2 Web Server.-MySQL MariaDB Server.-PHP 8.0+ (Recommended).-PHP Extensions: mysqli, gmp, mcrypt, soap, curl.-SMTP Server.Link: https://bitcoinsoftwares.online/product/crypto-coinflip-p2p-game-script/
